title: Moist Pear Bread
ingredients: ['2 pears, peeled, cored and grated', '1 pear, peeled, cored and mashed', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '1 egg white, lightly beaten', '2 tablespoons water', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '200g plain flour', '200g caster sugar', '4 tablespoons instant vanilla dessert mix, such as Angel Delight', '1 1/2 teaspoons cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/8 teaspoon baking powder']
